title: Badger Line
summary: The Badger line of ships focuses on mining efficiency and some hull reinforcement, resulting in a fast mining laser, but a slow movement speed. The Badger line is the most rewarding small-class miner, but like all small ships, can be easily destroyed by pirates.
full_text:
Badger Line
The Badger line of ships focuses on mining efficiency and some hull reinforcement, resulting in a fast mining laser, but a slow movement speed. The Badger line is the most rewarding small-class miner, but like all small ships, can be easily destroyed by pirates.
Capsule
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer
T1
Badger
T2
Honey Badger
Exotic
This line is recommended for newer players to use over the lighter and less efficient Marlin line.
